name: MISO
body:
Thank you for your interest in MISO! You can get to the source code by cloning the repo. If you'd like a simpler setup route to getting MISO up and running, please see our page on the [TGAC website](http://www.tgac.ac.uk/miso)

### Authors and Contributors

MISO is developed in-house at TGAC by Rob Davey (@froggleston), Xingdong Bian (@xbian), and Anil Thanki. Other contributors to date include: Antony Colles.
tagline: MISO: An open-source LIMS for NGS sequencing centres
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
